product.name: CoverGirl & Olay Simply Ageless Foundation
product.description:
This breakthrough formula with Olay Regenerist Serum and SPF 22 stays 
suspended over fine lines and wrinkles, unlike the leading anti-aging 
department store foundation that can gather in wrinkles and make skin 
look older. Clinically shown to provide significant improvement in skin 
condition in just four weeks.Features: SPF 22Stays suspended over fine lines and wrinklesEven coverageDermatologically-tested
